Office Phone: Individual Income Tax and Trust inquiries: 1.800.959.8281 Business and Self-employed Individuals: 1.800.959.5525 Universal Child Care Benefit, Canada Child Tax Benefit: 1.800.387.1193 Telerefund: 1.800.959.1956 GST/HST Credit for Individuals: 1.800.959.1953
Service Details: Administers tax laws for the Government of Canada and for most provinces and territories and various social and economic benefit and incentive programs delivered through the tax system. Please note that there is no walk-in counter service offered in any CRA locations.
Hours: Regular Hours for Individual Tax Enquiries:- Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 5:00pm (except holidays)Extended evening and weekend hours from Feb - Apr for individual income tax enquires:  - Mon-Fri: 9:00 am - 9:00pm (except holidays)- Sat: 9:00am - 5:00pm (except Easter weekend)More Information: www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency/corporate/contact-information/hours-telephone-service.html
